5932.verse: By the sky and the night comer -

5933.verse: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

5935.verse: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

5936.verse: So let man observe from what he was created.

5937.verse: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

5938.verse: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

5939.verse: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

5940.verse: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

5941.verse: Then man will have no power or any helper.

5943.verse: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

5944.verse: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

5946.verse: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

5947.verse: But I am planning a plan.

5948.verse: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

5949.verse: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

5952.verse: And who brings out the pasture

5954.verse: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

5955.verse: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

5956.verse: And We will ease you toward ease.

5957.verse: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

5958.verse: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

5959.verse: But the wretched one will avoid it -

5960.verse: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

5962.verse: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

5963.verse: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
